text: RTV Vikom is a Bosnian commercial television channel based in Bosanska Gradiška, Bosnia and Herzegovina. The program is mainly produced in Serbian language. TV station was established in 1997. == References == == External links == * Communications Regulatory Agency of Bosnia and Herzegovina Category:Mass media in Gradiška, Bosnia and Herzegovina Category:Television stations in Bosnia and Herzegovina Category:Television channels and stations established in 1997
title: RTV Vikom
